name: Get the party to at least level 22
Get the Sunblade in the Mirage Tower
Equip only a Thief's Armlet on the body slot
Do NOT run from any battle in the Citadel of Trials
Defeat Echidna in Earthgift Shrine
Get the Mage's Staff in the Sunken Shrine
Defeat Gilgamesh and Atomos in Lifespring Grotto
Get the party to at least level 25
Defeat Goblins at the Cavern of Earth
Use exactly 2 Thieves
Use at least 75 Potions
Use exactly 2 White Mages
Learn exactly two curative spells
Buy 99 Faerie Tonics at the Caravan
Learn at least two Level 6 spells for a character
Unlock one red seal in the Labyrinth of Time
Defeat at least one Dark Fighter
Defeat Ankheg
Use exactly 2 Warriors
Use at least 2 Gold Needles
Cast Thundaga at least twice
Spend at least 26,780 gil in Elfheim
Unlock two blue seals in the Labyrinth of Time
Get only 1 of Sunblade or Diamond Armor from chests
Put a Mindflayer to sleep
